title: Slope
description: Fast-paced 3D runner game.

title: Angry Birds
description: Knock down the bads piggies towers!

title: 1v1.LoL
description: Third person shooter & building simulator

title: Bad Parenting
description: Bad Parenting is a psychological horror game where you play as a child facing the terrifying Mr. Red Face and uncover the dark truth behind his existence.

title: BitLife
description: BitLife is a life simulation game where you make choices for a character from birth to death, shaping their career, relationships, habits, and overall life story.

title: Basket Random
description: Silly Pixelized basketball game

title: Chiikawa Puzzle
description: Try and recreate chiikawa from memory! Re-assemble him and see how funny he looks.

title: Bloxorz
description: Bloxorz is a challenging puzzle game where you control a rectangular block, rolling it across a platform to fit perfectly into a square hole without falling off the edges.

title: Minecraft
description: Minecraft is a sandbox video game that allows players to explore, build, and survive in a procedurally generated, block-based world.

title: Yume Nikki
description: Yume nikki is a surreal indie game where you explore the dream world of a reclusive girl, collecting strange effects in a haunting, wordless adventure.

title: Learn To Fly
description: Learn to Fly is a fun, physics-based game where you launch a penguin across the sky, upgrading gear and skills to fly farther with each attempt.

title: Granny
description: Granny is a horror stealth game where you must escape a creepy house without being caught by Granny, using stealth, puzzles, and quick thinking to survive.

title: Cut the Rope
description: Cut the Rope is a physics-puzzle game where you feed candy to a little monster named Om Nom by cutting ropes and triggering fun chain reactions.

title: Friday Night Funkin'
description: Friday Night Funkin’ is a rhythm game where you hit the right notes to rap and sing your way through quirky, challenging music battles.

title: Cookie Clicker
description: Cookie Clicker is an incremental game where you bake cookies by clicking and buying upgrades, watching your cookie empire grow endlessly.

title: Osu!
description: Osu! is a fast-paced rhythm game where you click, slide, and spin to the beat of songs with absurd precision and anime-level energy.

title: BLOODMONEY
description: BLOODMONEY! is a darkly twisted clicker game where you’re desperate to raise $25,000 for a life-saving surgery. You meet Harvey Harvington, who offers $1 per click—but to earn more, you must inflict pain on him using various tools.

title: Doki Doki Literature Club
description: Doki Doki Literature Club! starts as a cheerful high school dating sim but quickly turns into a psychological horror game. It breaks the fourth wall, using glitches and disturbing events to create a tense, unsettling story.

title: Doodle Jump
description: Doodle Jump is a fast-paced vertical platformer where you guide a little four-legged creature called “The Doodler” up an endless series of platforms, shooting monsters and dodging hazards.

title: The Binding of Issac: Wrath of the Lamb
description: The Binding of Isaac: Wrath of the Lamb is a dark, randomly generated roguelike shooter where a crying child battles grotesque monsters in a nightmarish basement inspired by biblical themes and psychological horror.

title: Class of ’09
description: Class of ’09 is a visual novel set in the early 2000s. Experience the chaos of high school life through sharp humor, edgy characters, and twisted choices!

title: Friday Night Funkin vs Shaggy Mod
description: Friday Night Funkin’ vs Shaggy is a rhythm game where you hit the right notes to rap and sing your way through quirky, challenging music battles.

title: Friday Night Funkin' Creepypasta Mod
description: Friday Night Funkin’ Creepypasta is a rhythm game where you hit the right notes to rap and sing your way through quirky, challenging music battles.

title: Lacey's Flash Games

title: Pou

title: Slender: The 8 Pages

title: Snowbattle.io
description: You are a snowplower, You roll around on the ice to create a snowball, Throw it at others and dodge other players snowballs!
